detaileddescription.para: The CFE_ES_RELOAD_APP_CC command is used to reload an application. This command stops the application, unloads the object file, loads the new object file specified in the command and starts the application again using the parameters defined when the application was originally started, either through the startup script or by way of the CFE_ES_START_APP_CC command.
Next: Listing Current Applications Prev: Restarting an Application Up To: Application and Child Task Service
